DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Finding specific protein blood may help doctor tell whether patient ovarian cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study well proteomic profile work diagnose ovarian cancer patient undergo surgery abnormal pelvic mass .
DOC.brief_title: Proteomic Profiling Diagnosing Ovarian Cancer Patients Who Are Undergoing Surgery Abnormal Pelvic Mass
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Generate validate serum proteomic profile predict presence invasive ovarian epithelial cancer use preoperative serum specimen obtain patient undergoing surgical evaluation abnormal pelvic mass . Secondary - Generate proteomic profile distinguish early- late-stage invasive ovarian epithelial cancer use preoperative serum specimens patient subsequently diagnose invasive ovarian epithelial cancer . Tertiary - Determine whether serum proteomic profiling predict presence postoperative residual disease patient . - Determine whether serum proteomic profiling predict prognosis patient . OUTLINE : This pilot , two-part , multicenter study . - Part A : Within 3 week prior surgical evaluation , patient undergo collection serum specimen proteomic profile use surface-enhanced matrix-associated laser desorption ionization spectrometry-time flight detection ( SELDI/MALDI-TOF ) . Patients undergo surgical evaluation ( i.e. , biopsy and/or resection ) pelvic mass . Patients diagnose invasive ovarian epithelial adenocarcinoma papillary serous fallopian tube carcinoma ( low malignant potential tumor ) AND without postoperative infection proceed part B study . - Part B : Patients undergo collection postoperative serum specimen proteomic profile use SELDI/MALDI-TOF within 3-8 week surgery , start chemotherapy , end chemotherapy . After completion study procedure , patient follow periodically 10 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 2,000 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Abnormal pelvic mass physical examination image test Undiagnosed Planning undergo surgical evaluation within next 3 week PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Not specify Renal Not specify Other Negative pregnancy test PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Surgery See Disease Characteristics
